author: Gus_263
title: Favorite 03' matoran
review: Not showed very in the movie, but he is really the kohlii champion. The colors are awesome, the brown was a good color, but it don't appears in the newest sets. The kohlii stick and the ball can beplayed with the matoran's moves. He isn't very playable, but is a good set.

author: Miki92
title: kolhii champion
review: this guy comes with a kolhii stick and a kolhii disc he has great movement (just like all of the classic toas) i used the old version kolhii ball that came with pohatu with hewkii all because of the mata nui online game 2 i also got the other matorans who played kolhii at the same time that i got this one i cant think of anything wrong with him 5/5

author: KLOKRIECHER
title: LEGO BIONICLE (Matoran) - Hewkii Review
review:
This is a nice little figure to have and it's fun to play with as well.

Box/Instructions

The instruction has only 2 pages and there're no mistakes in it.

Parts

This set has 25 pieces and it was 4 USD when it was on sale. That means that the price per piece ratio was 16 cents per piece which is a really good value for this figure.

The build

The build is very nice and easy and we also don't need to worry about stickers.

The completed model

[img]http://www.klokriecher.de/gallery_pics/l/8584-1.jpg[/img]


The arms, the hands the legs and the feet can be adjusted and on the back of the torso is a gear which you can use to move the torso to the right and/or to the left. This figure also has a hockey stick which has a puck in it. You can take out the puck of the hockey stick very easily as well. I really like this figure - even if it doesn't do much.

Summary

All in all this set is an great set and I would recommend you to get this. You can find this set on eBay, BrickLink and Amazon for sure. Here is the link where you can check out the full gallery I made for this set on my website: http://www.klokriecher.de
